focusAreas.description: Reducing time-to-activation through intuitive, delightful onboarding experiences that convert users into engaged customers
focusAreas.title: Onboarding

focusAreas.description: Unlocking recurring revenue with thoughtful subscription models, billing flows, and payment experiences.
focusAreas.title: Revenue & Subscriptions

focusAreas.description: Scaling through API-first product design and intuitive, comprehensive documentation to enhance adoption for tech and non-tech people alike.
focusAreas.title: Developer Experience

personal.heroMessage: Let's build and deliver delight together!
personal.name: Vaibhav Bansal
personal.summary: Hi, I am Vaibhav. With 4 years working in product companies and 2+ years leading high-impact product initiatives, I specialize in building technical, scalable solutions that drive business outcomes.

projects.description: Sandbox Console is the control centre for customers to onboard, manage billing, and monitor usage without relying on internal teams. By replacing a legacy internal dashboard with a self-serve experience, Console cut customer activation time from ~2 weeks to ~3 days and freed sales and ops from repetitive setup work.
projects.subtitle: Cut onboarding-to-activation from 2 weeks to 3 days
projects.title: Sandbox Console

projects.description: Sandbox GST APIs helps businesses automate GST workflows like onboarding returns, E-Invoicing, and E-Way Billing. By packaging these flows into predictable APIs with clear documentation, we unlocked new ERP and fintech integrations and drove 20%+ of Sandbox platform revenue in FY 2024–25.
projects.subtitle: Drove 20%+ of Sandbox annual revenue (FY 2024–25)
projects.title: GST API Suite

projects.description: Led an org-wide shift to storyboarding and Scrum so product, design, and engineering had a shared way of planning work. This improved sprint predictability, reduced last-minute surprises, and made it easier for teams to align on user value before committing to builds.
projects.subtitle: Introduced storyboarding & Scrum across teams
projects.title: Agile Transformation

projects.description: This started as my personal site and evolved into a reusable portfolio template that anyone can fork and adapt. Instead of hardcoding content, everything flows from a simple Sanity CMS schema, so adding or editing projects takes a few minutes in a dashboard—not a code push. The result is a fast, minimal site that lets people ship a credible portfolio quickly.
projects.subtitle: CMS-powered portfolio that anyone can customize and deploy
projects.title: Modern Portfolio Template

projects.description: Qpon is a campaign engine that lets growth teams launch targeted offers without waiting on engineering. It has powered 30k+ plan upgrades in FY 2024–25 while keeping misuse low through guardrails on eligibility, discount limits, expiry and more. This turned promotions into a reliable revenue lever instead of ad-hoc one-offs.
projects.subtitle: Drove upsells by enabling 30k users to upgrade
projects.title: Qpon

projects.description: Rebuilt Quicko’s partner and affiliate platform so 250+ partners could easily track referrals, conversions, and payouts. Event-based workflows, transparent dashboards and tiered rewards helped partners refer 100k+ customers in FY 2024–25, turning Cliq into a scalable, data-rich acquisition channel.
projects.subtitle: Achieved 100k+ referred customers via 250+ partners
projects.title: Cliq

projects.description: Revamped Sandbox API documentation to boost developer experience (DX). New users now start with guides, recipes and a web-based testing environment rather than a flat list of endpoints, which reduces time to activation, support queries and makes it easier for non-technical stakeholders to understand capabilities.
projects.subtitle: Revamped DX that decreases time to activation
projects.title: Sandbox API Docs
